mapper.select: select BoRepNo, boardNo, r.userNo, boRepContent, boRepReg, boRepUpdate, u.nick as userNick from board_reply r left join users u on r.userNo = u.userNo where boardNo = #{boardNo} order by r.boRepReg desc
mapper.update: update board b set b.boRepCnt = ( select count(r.boRepNo) from board_reply r where b.boardNo = r.boardNo )
mapper.insert: insert into board_reply (boRepNo, boardNo, userNo, boRepContent, boRepReg, boRepUpdate) values (default, #{boardNo}, #{userNo}, #{boRepContent}, default, default)
